metadata.title: CVE-2018-6187 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
In Artifex MuPDF 1.12.0, there is a heap-based buffer overflowvulnerability in the do_pdf_save_document function in the pdf/pdf-write.cfile. Remote attackers could leverage the vulnerability to cause a denialof service via a crafted pdf file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-6187` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mupdf - 1.13.0+ds1-1
mupdf-tools - 1.13.0+ds1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mupdf package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.13.0+ds1-1').
